Name: AR15 SPR .300 AAC Blackout Special Purpose Rifle MOD3
Description: The ST AR-15, modified for the third time using a four-star assault rifle template. The modification primarily focuses on reducing recoil, enhancing stability during shooting, and increasing overall performance. Maintenance costs are quadrupled. This is the AR-15 SPR special purpose rifle used after the third modification of the ST AR-15, chambered in .300 AAC Blackout subsonic ammunition.
